data.message: Logical target's of the Black Human Afrikan masses liberation revolution struggle law enforcement communications , law enforcement mobility car's before there car's are eliminated weapons and ammo and technology must be taking to give to your local unit , avoid law enforcement personal armor carriers until we have eating off the enemy to the point that we have weapons to make them go boom for lack of a better words , law enforcement headquarters in your local area must be eliminated but before that weapon's and ammo and body armor and any intelligence or intelligence tool's that can be used in the unit's spy networks must be taking before the law enforcement headquarters in your local area is eliminated, now with a higher level of tool's to be used in the Black Human Afrikan masses revolution we can turn back and re group while well trained sniping unit's are applying pressure around the nation by killing pig's around the nation , this is were the national guard , army , military , navy, air force, and any organization's of the state that we don't know about will start running operation's on the networks of connected African community's around the nation there key target's will be the African warrior class , our communications, and soft target's the Black Human Afrikan kids and women and old but we will hit there strong target's before they hit ours to put the fear of the Black Human Afrikan Masses Nation back in them to let them know this is not play time, now when it comes to the national guard , army , military , navy, air force and so on our African people in these organization's will have to pick a side at this critical time used there skill's, training, and tool's and taking the enemy tank's ,fighter jets, military drones and military weapons and ammo and tool's to be used in the interest of the re rise of the Black Human Afrikan nation or the European ruling class that don't care if they live or die as long as the mission is accomplished, enemy pig's taking to Black Human Afrikan controlled lock down site's and the pig's are treated with kindness because they will be key tools to be used for the Black Human Afrikan masses revolution unit's must be doing tactical training, study groups of our African history and the true history of the enemy and the world must be teach to every Afrikan man, woman ,and kid that survives the Afrikan revolution all Afrikan political prisoner's freed , and the masses of Afrikans locked up to work for slave wage's will be handed over to the Black Human African Masses for re education but if the crimes are rape , and killing Afrikan's not in self defense they will be killed if the soldiers in prison have not already disciplined them.....now why would i and millions of African's think like this let's see here 400 years and counting of slavery ,colonialism, imperialism, neo-colonialism, stolen Black Afrikan human's ,and stolen African natural resources and land, rape , genocide, killing , sex slavery, economic slavery, political slavery ,and military slavery you know the Afrikan holocaust that is still going on at this very time until the Afrikan warrior class is organized to the point that we ride in the interest of every Afrikan man woman and kid and thus the masses of Afrikan's and the Afrikan united civilizations and Afrika and all it's element's keep marching and protesting and making reforms to 400 years and counting of slavery ,colonialism, imperialism, neo-colonialism, stolen Afrikan human's ,and stolen Afrikan natural resources and land, rape , genocide, killing , sex slavery, economic slavery, political slavery ,and military slavery you know the Afrikan holocaust and begging for what we can do for our self's. Anthony X European's love talking about how indigenous people on there own land how they need green cards to be on there own land , depicting on there propaganda outlets news podcast, newspapers, t.v., movies, games, online how indigenous people of this land called by Europeans -----(Black human Afrikan Olmecs)------ ,Mexicans,indian tribes how they are primitive and uncivilized , maids, maids used as sex object's , taking European jobs, non political, economical, military in the interest of the masses of there people the same thing they do to the Afrikan masses can you image the MS 13 civilizations , and other indigenous people lost street tribes being in a allied forces with the Crip civilizations, Blood civilizations, Folk civilizations and the rest of the lost African street tribe's with African revolutionary and indigenous people revolutionary leadership to form a liberation Army for the united indigenous people civilizations and the united African civilizations to wage war on the European ruling class and there Agent's politically, economically, militarily in the interest of the Indigenous Human Masses and Black Human Afrikan masses to make European's need a green card to be on this land and in Afrika and all land's water's and air's and all space and all galaxies lol in do time. Anthony X
